Portfolio

A Small Taste of What I've made

  • The Core Website

    Jekyll powered site featuring highly optimised SEO and an intuitive bespoke booking wizard.

  • Carl Web App

    2nd place winner at SoT Hackfest, featuring a gorgeous design and slick animations.

  • Luo Programming Language

    An entirely custom made object oriented programming language featuring static typing.

  • Bold macOS App

    A beautiful editor for native CSS and SVG animations, written in Swift.

  • The Core Brand Marketing

    Lead designer on all marketing materials with a clean, consistent design to brand specification.

  • Silica UI Framework

    Featuring bezier and font renderers, themes, windowing and event systems and much more.

  • Keystone Next Web App

    A quick and easy to use collator of homework, timetable and more built using Laravel.

  • OneOS ComputerCraft OS

    Sporting an easy to use graphical interface, this has seen almost a quater of a million views.

About Me

  • Designer

    I am very passionate about designing beautiful and easy to use interfaces. Design is always the first aspect I consider.

    I am highly skilled in Photoshop, Illustrator and CSS particularly.

  • Developer

    I am a very versatile developer, with extensive skills in both front and backends. I started coding when I was 10 and simply never stopped.

    My favourite languages/frameworks include Swift, Laravel, Lua, Jekyll and countless more.

  • Employment

    I am currently the Senior Developer at The Core where I have been in since February 2016.

    My role includes web & backend development, graphic design, logistics and customer support.

  • Home

    I currently live in central Auckland, New Zealand.

    I have lived all over Australia and New Zealand - six cities to be exact.

  • Education

    I am currently doing a conjoint degree at The University of Auckland, majoring in computer science, marketing and information systems.

    I also attended St Peter’s College in Adelaide where I was prefect and house captain.

  • Music

    I love listening to albums from start to finish. My favourite artists include Tame Impala, Radiohead, Arcade Fire, alt-J, Lorde and many more.

  • Podcasts

    I listen to an unhealthy amount of podcasts. Anything that’s funny, interesting, or both, I’ll listen to.
